thread.title: Jeffrey Schlupp: Jamie Vardy makes defenders' lives miserable
thread.title_full: Jeffrey Schlupp: Jamie Vardy makes defenders' lives miserable

title: Jeffrey Schlupp: Jamie Vardy makes defenders' lives miserable
text:
Sports News | 10 October 2015 18:55 CET Jeffrey Schlupp: Jamie Vardy makes defenders' lives miserable - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana and Leicester City defender Jeffrey Schlupp 
Premier League defenders hate playing against Jamie Vardy because the Leicester City forward’s relentless pressing makes him a real “pest” according to team mate Jeffrey Schlupp. 
Vardy’s stunning start to the season sees him leading the league’s goal scoring charts with seven strikes in eight games and the shift he puts in during matches has been key to Leicester’s sustained stint in the top half of the table. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Seeking revenge is not in the laws of love, but interceding is the first of the love's laws. By: Kyei-Afrifa Ma Germ
